scripts.setup: npm run install ; npm run config ; npm run build ; npm run db
scripts.install: git submodule update --init ; git submodule foreach npm ci
scripts.db: cd uask-sys; APP_ENV=demo npm run migrate ; APP_ENV=demo npm run seed
scripts.start: npm run start-sys & npm run start-app
scripts.start-sys: cd uask-sys ; NODE_ENV=demo npm run start
